title: Common Entrance Test, Not Class 12 Marks, To Drive College Admissions - NDTV
content: Common Entrance Test, Not Class 12 Marks, To Drive College Admissions  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: College admissions will be based on a common entrance test from now, not Class 12 marks. This will do away with the stress of impossibly high college cut-offs  often as much as 100% - University Grants Commission (UGC) chief Jagadesh Kumar says.
